name.ja: <ruby>白の仲裁<rt>ホワイト・アービトレーション</rt></ruby>

text.en: You can target 1 Fish monster you control; it is treated as a Tuner this turn. When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can discard 1 Fish monster; change all monsters your opponent controls to Defense Position. If your Fish monster(s) is destroyed by battle or sent to the GY: You can send this face-up card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; Special Summon 1 Fish monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "White Arbitration" once per turn.
